Sql.query: insert into me_medicion24( lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, meditotal, mediestado, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, lastuser, lastdate ) values( :lectcodi, :medifecha, :tipoinfocodi, :ptomedicodi, :meditotal, :mediestado, :h1, :h2, :h3, :h4, :h5, :h6, :h7, :h8, :h9, :h10, :h11, :h12, :h13, :h14, :h15, :h16, :h17, :h18, :h19, :h20, :h21, :h22, :h23, :h24, :lastuser, :lastdate )

update me_medicion24 set lectcodi = :lectcodi, medifecha = :medifecha, tipoinfocodi = :tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi = :ptomedicodi, meditotal = :meditotal, mediestado = :mediestado, h1 = :h1, h2 = :h2, h3 = :h3, h4 = :h4, h5 = :h5, h6 = :h6, h7 = :h7, h8 = :h8, h9 = :h9, h10 = :h10, h11 = :h11, h12 = :h12, h13 = :h13, h14 = :h14, h15 = :h15, h16 = :h16, h17 = :h17, h18 = :h18, h19 = :h19, h20 = :h20, h21 = :h21, h22 = :h22, h23 = :h23, h24 = :h24, lastuser = :lastuser, lastdate = :lastdate where

select lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, meditotal, mediestado, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, lastuser, lastdate where from me_medicion24

select lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, meditotal, mediestado, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, lastuser, lastdate from me_medicion24

select lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, meditotal, mediestado, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, lastuser, lastdate from me_medicion24

select m24.*, tpto.tipoptomedinomb,eq.equinomb,ti.tipoinfoabrev from me_medicion24 m24 inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = m24.ptomedicodi inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = pto.equicodi inner join me_tipoptomedicion tpto on tpto.tipoptomedicodi = pto.tipoptomedicodi inner join si_tipoinformacion ti on ti.tipoinfocodi = m24.tipoinfocodi inner join si_empresa empr on empr.emprcodi = eq.emprcodi where m24.lectcodi = {0} and pto.origlectcodi ={1} and m24.medifecha >= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND (empr.emprcodi in ({4}) or '{4}' = '-1') and (eq.equipadre in ({5}) or '{5}' = '-1') and m24.medifecha <= to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD') order by m24.medifecha asc, m24.ptomedicodi asc

select me.* from me_medicion24 me inner join me_hojaptomed hp on hp.ptomedicodi = me.ptomedicodi and hp.tipoinfocodi = me.tipoinfocodi inner join me_formatohoja fh on fh.formatcodi = hp.formatcodi inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = hp.ptomedicodi where hp.formatcodi = {0} and pto.emprcodi = {1} and medifecha >= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND medifecha <= to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD') order by hp.hojaptoorden asc
